sentence.text: In the case-control analysis, the rs9607195 A>G on intergenic area 250 kb away from the regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II gene and the rs12738007 A>G on the intron of the MECR gene were the most strongly associated SNPs with the risk of schizophrenia (P = 6.2 × 10(-8) , OR = 0.50 and P = 3.7 × 10(-7) , OR = 2.39, respectively).

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
